channel.title: How to Get Putty to Work in Ubuntu - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Add this stuff to the top of /etc/ssh/ssh_config KexAlgorithms=+diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 Ciphers aes128-ctr,aes192-ctr,aes256-ctr,aes128-cbc,3des-cbc HostKeyAlgorithms ssh-rsa PubkeyAcceptedKeyTypes ssh-rsa Getting putty to work in Ubuntu sudo apt-get update sudo apt install putty Go to fonts menu and change fonts to Ubuntu.
